info.title: Media OS - Digital Spy API
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

parameters.name: _callback
parameters.description: The jsonp callback function name.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Will return content where the title equals the passed in title.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The URL of the content on the web.  It's essentially everything to the right of the rightmost slash

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the section on the site to pull data from.

parameters.name: subsection_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the subsection on the site to pull data from.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the collection to pull data from.

parameters.name: ad_category_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the ad category to pull data from.

parameters.name: content_type_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the content type to pull data from.

parameters.name: publishedFrom
parameters.description: The publish date from which no content published earlier will be returned.  Format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm.

parameters.name: publishedTo
parameters.description: The publish date from which no content published later will be returned.  Format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: 1 for published articles only, 0 for draft articles, blank for both.

parameters.name: all_images
parameters.description: Flag to determine whether all associated images are returned for a given article.  This includes processing image ID short codes in the article body and making them part of the image JSON structure.  When not enabled, a singlle headline image is returned for each article.  Values are 0 or 1.

parameters.name: get_image_cuts
parameters.description: Flag to determine whether or not to retrieve all associated image cuts for every image.  Values are 0 or 1.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to return.  Default set of fields is documented in the API Settings document. Use * for all fields.

parameters.name: ignore_cache
parameters.description: Flag as to whether or not to ingore internal caching.  Values are 0 or 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records returned.  Allowable values are from 1 to 1,000.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Sort order for results returned.  Please specify the field name and sort order (asc/desc) separated with a space.

parameters.name: _callback
parameters.description: The jsonp callback function name.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The primary key.

parameters.name: image_title
parameters.description: Will return images where the title equals the passed in title.

parameters.name: file_domain
parameters.description: The domain where the image is hosted. First of three fields to construct the actual URL (file_domain + file_path + file_name).

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: The directory path where the image is hosted. Second of three fields to construct the actual URL (file_domain + file_path + file_name).

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: The file name of the image. Third of three fields to construct the actual URL (file_domain + file_path + file_name).

parameters.name: ed_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the editor .

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the section on the site to pull data from.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords associated with the image (separated by spaces).

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the image.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the image in pixels.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the image in pixels.

parameters.name: get_image_cuts
parameters.description: Flag to determine whether or not to retrieve all associated image cuts for every image.  Values are 0 or 1.

parameters.description: The jsonp callback function name.

parameters.description: The primary key.

parameters.name: ed_username
parameters.description: The username of the editor.

parameters.name: ed_firstname
parameters.description: The editor's first name.

parameters.name: ed_lastname
parameters.description: The editor's last name.

parameters.name: ed_fullname
parameters.description: The editor's full name.

parameters.name: ed_email
parameters.description: The editor's email address.

parameters.name: section_sitename
parameters.description: The name of the section.

parameters.name: section_url
parameters.description: The url part of the section as used on the site.

parameters.name: section_isactive
parameters.description: Is the section active or not.  Valid are '1' or '0'.

parameters.name: meta_title
parameters.description: The meta title of the section.

parameters.name: meta_description
parameters.description: The meta description of the section.

parameters.name: meta_keywords
parameters.description: The meta keywords for the section.

parameters.description: The section_id of the parent section.

parameters.description: The primary key.

parameters.name: ad_category_name
parameters.description: The name of the ad category.
